
```{r}
state <- function(x){
  stateList <- c()
  for(ii in 1:length(x)){
    if(x[ii] < 1){
      stateList <- c(stateList, "dry")
    }
    if(x[ii] >= 1){
      stateList <- c(stateList, "wet")
    }
  }
  return(stateList)
}
weather_data$state <- state(weather_data$Rainfall.amount..millimetres.)
```
